data.text: “Nin sakhuo sintumngei nin sinngei hah miriem mitmua, mi mu rangin sin no roi. Ma neinunngei hah mi mu rangin nin sinin chu, invâna nin Pa kôm renga ite râisânman man no tunui.6:1: Mat 23:5

“Masikin miriem a nângngei neinun nin pêkin, maha alienin minlang no roi, asarothol ngeiin mi minpâkna an chang theina rangin inkhôm inngeia le lamlienngeia an tho ngâi anghan tho no roi. Nangni ki ril an râisânman chu an man suozoi.
Hannirese, nangni chu miriem intakngei nin sanin, nin ruol satakngei khomin an riet loi rang lamin tho roi.
Hanchu, inrûka sin tho nîng nin ta, male inrûka nin sintho mu ngâipu nan Pa han râisânman nangni pêk a tih.”

“Chubai nin tho zorân, asarotholngei angin tho no roi! Mîn an mu theina rangin inkhôm inngeia le lamlien sîrngeia indinga chubaitho an minlut ngâi, adiktakin nangni ki ril, an râisânman chu pêkin an omsuo zoi.6:5: Luk 18:10-14

Aniatachu nangni chu chubai nin thôn, nin khâltana lût ungla, inkhâr khâr ungla, male mita mutheiloi nin Pa kôm chubaitho roi. Hanchu, inrûka nin sintho mu ngâipu, nin Pa han râisânman nangni pêng a tih.”
“Chubai nin tho zorân, sonongngei anghan chongkâmboi ngei mang no roi, anni ngei han an chubai tho sôt sikin an pathien'n riet uol rangin an mindon ngâi ani.
Anni angin om no roi. Nin ngên mân nin Pa'n nin nâng chu a rietsai kêng ani.
Hanchu, mahi nin chubai tho rang lam chu ani:
Na Rêngram juong tung rese;
Anîngtina kin nâng ngâi dôr sâk avien hin mi pêk roh.6:11: kin nâng; aninônchu aviena rang; aninônchu nangtûka rang.
Kin chunga sin minchâingei kin ngâidam anghan,
Sietna ranga methêmna tieng mi tuong nônla,
“Nin chunga midangngei tho minchâi ngei nin ngâidamin chu, invâna nin Pa khomin nangni ngâidam a tih.6:14-15: Mk 11:25
Aniatachu midangngei nin ngâidam nônchu, nin tho minchâina ngei nin Pa'n nangni ngâidam no nih.

“Bu nin ngêi zorân, asarotholngei anghan inngûi mêl pêl no roi. Anni chu mi mitmua bu ngêia an inlang theina rangin an inngûi ngâi ani. Adiktakin nangni ki ril, an râisânman chu an man suozoi.
Nangni chu bu nin ngêi zora khomin nin mâi phie ungla, nin sam khûi roi,
hankêng nin bungêi hah midangngeiin riet thei noni ngeia, mita mutheiloi nin Pa vaiin riet a tih. Male inrûka nin sintho mu ngâipu nin Pa han râisânman nangni a pêk rang ani.”
“Pila, arenge le aêkin asiet theina, inrungeiin an murûk theina hin ninta rangin rochon mintûp no roi.6:19: Jak 5:2-3
Manêkin invâna, arenge le thîr-êkin asiet thei khâiloina le inrungei khomin an murûk thei khâiloina muna ninta rangin rochon mintûp roi.
No rochon omna muna han zoratin nu mulungrîl om atih.”
“Mitngei hih takpum ranga châti angin ani. Nin mitngei hah asân chu nin takpum pumpui vârin sip a ta;
Aniatachu nin mitngei hah asa nônchu nin takpum pumpui ajîngkhap rang ani. Masikin nin sûnga vâr hah ajîng nisenla, kho dôra jîngindên mo ani rang!”

“Tutên puma inik tîrlâm chang thei noni ngei; ama han inkhat mumâk a ta; inkhat lungkham a tih, aninônchu, ama han inkhat midituol a ta, inkhat heng a tih. Pathien le sum sintho molop thei no tunui.

“Masika han, nangni ki ril, nin ringna rangin imo ka sâkin ke nêk rang, aninônchu takpum rangin imo ki sillin ko bom rang tiin nin kângmindoi no roi. Sâknêk rangin ringna alut uol ok nimak mo? Sil le bom nêkin takpum alut uol nimak mo?

Chunga vuong vangei khi en roi; chimu tû mak ngeia, bu ât uol mak ngeia, sasiera bu mintûp uol mak ngei; hankhoma Invâna om nin Pa'n a donsui ngei tit ngâi! Nangni vâng chu, vangei nêkin nin lut uol ok nimak mo?
Tumo nin ringna chungroia a kângmindoi sika a ringna minsei uol6:27: ringna minsei uol; aninônchu ansâng uola ansôn. thei rang nin ni?
“Ithomo sil le bom rang sikin nin mulung nin min kâng? Rama pârngei insôn tie so en ta u: an ta rangin sin khom tho uol mâk ngeia, puon khom không mak ngei.
“Aniatachu, nangni ki ril, Rêng Solomon luo a neina murdi leh ânvô khomin hima pârngei6:29: 1 Rêng 10:4-7; 2 Rich 9:3-6 mêlsa inkhat dôr hih enhoi mak.

Ram sûl avien a oma, nangtûka aboi nôka lungthu meia tuorip rang sûl luo hah ma angtak han Pathien'n a minvôn anînle, sil le bom khom nangni pêk uol ngêt no ni mo? Idôra taksônna chîn dôn mo nin ni!
“Masikin, khotieng renga mo ka sâk, ke nêk rang le ki sil ko bom rang ahong suok rang? Tiin nin kângmindoi no roi.
“(Sonongngei chu ma neinunngei vai hah kêng an mindon ngâi.) Ma neinunngei murdi hah nin nâng tiin invâna nan Pa'n a riet let ngâi ani.
Manêkin chu, neinun dang dangngei nêkin Pathien Rêngram le nangnia a minnângngei hah mindon bak ungla, hanchu, ma neinunngei murdi ha chu nangni a pêk sa rang ani.
Masikin nangtûka rangin nan kângmindoi no roi; maha khom kângdoinangei ahun rang dôr a dôna. Sûn zeta intaknangei a hongchôi ngâi pêna chu bôk rang nâng mak.”
